title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 172.1 - Activity funds
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 172.1 - Activity funds

State Regulations

An organization within a school district whose activities
are conducted by students and whose financial support is raisesd other than by
taxation or through charges of the board of education shall be known as an
extraclassroom activity and the moneys received by it as extraclassroom
activity funds. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
172.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
